articles.title: Women's World Cup 2022: India eye semi-final berth, take on South Africa in must-win match - India Today
articles.description: Women's World Cup 2022: India need to beat South Africa in their final league game on Sunday to keep their campaign alive and seal a spot in the semi-final of the tournament.
